Banking & Finance.title: India plans to retain voting rights cap for large bank shareholders despite liberalisation push
Banking & Finance.summary: The Reserve Bank of India and the Finance Ministry discussed raising the limits but decided to keep the current 26% cap for private banks and 10% for state-owned lenders to prevent excessive control by any single investor

Technology Sector.summary: In the footage, the Canadian man throws his phone aside in frustration, prompting the Indian man to pick it up. The visibly intoxicated aggressor then charges at him, shoving and grabbing him by the collar.
